room_title: Escape room "The Den" by BamBoozled Escape Rooms in Hart
room_description: Picture this, your best friend is leaving for a trip with his girlfriend. They are at the airport, which is 25 minutes away. Their flight leaves in an hour and a half. His plan is to propose to his girlfriend while on their Hawaiian vacation. But, there is one problem...he forgot the ring! He has hidden the ring really well so that his girlfriend did not stumble across it. It is up to you to find the ring and deliver it to the airport before their flight leaves, you have one hour.
